comments:
I have a Standard C Make project with large number of files. When I try to search for References in Working Set, instead of launching a dialog box for selecting the working set, nothing appears. After sometime, eclipse crashes. The .log file shows NPE:

Thanks for reporting the exception. The action now brings up the working-set selection dialog, as expected.
